text: Hagi Solomoni'a vahe'ma oti trara bronsire tro hu'neankino, atupa kazigamo'a 2mitagi 20sentimita higeno, zaza kazigamo'a anahu huno 2mitagi 20sentimita higeno, anagamima mareri'amo'a 1mitagi 30sentimita hu'ne. Hagi maka Israeli vahe zamavuga Solomoni'a vahe'ma o'neti'za trate eme otiteno, tarega azantre'na monarega rusu'neteno arena nereno,
